Summary: Moving from west to east in the sky about cloud high.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Bradenton
There were no other sightings in Bradenton on or around May 15th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsIt made no sound at all and moved across the sky slower than a airplane and seem to pause, reverse, move left to right at right angles and than continue on from west to east. At one point the white light (the whole thing was white) would just go out like a lite switch and than come back on. I called my friend to see it and we both watched it untill it was to far to see. I went to Aviation High School and I know how an airplane can move in flight and how it "CAN NOT" move in flight. It was very large, much bigger than any plane. Again, It made absoloutly no sound at all. We live in a very quite place and there was no other noise.
